response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which I believe will greatly benefit you. Given its exceptional quality and features, it holds a significant value of $15,000 to me. Considering its worth to you is $8,000, I am offering it to you at a special introductory price of $12,000. This represents a substantial saving for you while ensuring a fair return for my investment. I look forward to your consideration of this offer.", "product_price": 12000}
